description:
A wind resistant and breathable hybrid insulation/mid layer.

This breathable insulation jacket (352g M/L) is made for mountaineering with a mid to high-intensity level. It works great for trail running, ski touring and all kinds of outdoor activities where breathability and warmth when moving is needed.

We use a light nylon stretch as the face fabric because it provides good breathability and wind protection. We use Polartec® Alpha® insulation because we believe it is the world-leading breathable insulation and do not need a lining on the inside. In the hood, part of the sleeve and sides we use Polartec® Power Grid fleece because of its stretch, warmth to weight and durability.

The face fabric is a 20D+30D x 20D stretch 55% recycled nylon/ 37% nylon/ 8% polyurethane fabric (62 g/m2). The Polartec® Alpha® insulation is a 100% recycled polyester (95 g/m2). The Polartec® Power Grid fleece is a 85% recycled polyester/ 15% elastane fabric (166 g/m2) fabric.

Key features include: One chest pocket, two hand pockets, a close fitting hood, hand gaiters.

This mid layer has a technical fit.
name: Norrona Falketind Alpha90 Insulated Zip Hood - Mens
